MOEX.ME.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company Moscow Exchange MICEX-RTS
MOEX.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Moscow Exchange MICEX-RTS, an integrated exchange, provides competitive trading, clearing, settlement, depository, and information services to market participants. The company is also involved in the repository service, commodities exchange, financial service, fintech start-up, and information security service businesses. It operates on the foreign currencies exchange, government securities and money, derivative financial instruments, equities, corporate and regional bonds, and commodities markets. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
